fd9ef1223e855714294498ebfde79f98 (19:19): 5fc127a8af156fc0ae394940d7efd0f4: about 70% of the way through looking at things not yet tf-tagged
fd9ef1223e855714294498ebfde79f98 (19:20): 5fc127a8af156fc0ae394940d7efd0f4: there are around 90 tf-tagged bugs
fd9ef1223e855714294498ebfde79f98 (19:20): 5fc127a8af156fc0ae394940d7efd0f4: rich is continuing working on his canvas cp
fd9ef1223e855714294498ebfde79f98 (19:20): 5fc127a8af156fc0ae394940d7efd0f4: about a week or two away from bringing to wg
fd9ef1223e855714294498ebfde79f98 (19:21): 5fc127a8af156fc0ae394940d7efd0f4: he's getting feedback on the cp from browser vendors
fd9ef1223e855714294498ebfde79f98 (19:21): 5fc127a8af156fc0ae394940d7efd0f4: text subteam is looking at things they want reconsidered
fd9ef1223e855714294498ebfde79f98 (19:21): 5fc127a8af156fc0ae394940d7efd0f4: work slowed at end of aug due to holidays etc.
fd9ef1223e855714294498ebfde79f98 (19:22): 5fc127a8af156fc0ae394940d7efd0f4: question about the last call bug from association for american publishers re: longdesc=""
fd9ef1223e855714294498ebfde79f98 (19:22): 5fc127a8af156fc0ae394940d7efd0f4: would like to attach their work as appendix to the longdesc="" proposal
fd9ef1223e855714294498ebfde79f98 (19:23): 139513027e8e90b5582cbc68fc733884: yes, folding that into the ISSUE-30 cp is the right thing to do
fd9ef1223e855714294498ebfde79f98 (19:23): 139513027e8e90b5582cbc68fc733884: the new bug will likely be marked as a duplicate of the old ISSUE-30 bug
fd9ef1223e855714294498ebfde79f98 (19:24): 5fc127a8af156fc0ae394940d7efd0f4: spent a lot of time on this morning's a11y call on generated content & a11y
